assumptions.red: hot-headed, aggressive, and the life of the party
assumptions.blue: reserved, moody, and must follow a crowd
assumptions.triangle: witty but prone to hurtful behavior
assumptions.square: good with following instructions, can't say no
assumptions.fast: impatient, reckless, and a constant go-getter
assumptions.medium: live in the moment, and think planning is an annoyance
assumptions.slow: take things at their own pace, always late to the trend
